author: M K
text:
Asix-year-old boy, Sivaram, was beaten to death by his schoolmate who was all of 12 years in a school in Tirupur city on Wednesday.

The murder came to light after a student found the body behind the school toilet.

The police have conducted a preliminary inquiry. The murder has sent shockwaves among the local residents and raised many serious questions about children’s safety in schools and child psychology.

The police said that there were not many students in the school when the incident took place, but an 11-year-old girl saw them quarrel through a window.
title: Boy murdered at school
